This will be just a simple bar chart in descending order

## Set up: set options, load packages and read in data

```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#prevent scientific notation
options(scipen = 999999)

# load packages
library(scales)
library(tidyverse)

# read in data

bps_mz2 <- read_csv("data/bps_mz2.csv")

head(bps_mz2)
```

## Try Bar Chart

```{r}

bpsChart <- 
  ggplot(data = bps_mz2, aes(x = reorder(bps_name,acres), y = acres)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  labs(
    title = "",
    subtitle = "Represents dominant vegetation systems pre-European colonization",
    caption = "Represents ~95% of the landscape. \nData from landfire.gov.",
    x = "",
    y = "Acres") +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_bw() +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = comma) 


bpsChart

```
